educations.school: National Taipei University of Technology, Taiwan
educations.content: Here, I learned OOAD, SQL, PHP, MVC, Angular and more. I also started working in Cloudpe Corp. and learned about how the real life platform is.
I spent half year in CTU to enjoy a life in eastern Europe. Life there was nice and I continued making a web based video conference system using ThinkPHP, Flash, and Bootstrap.

I am lucky enough to have the chance to be an exchange student to OIT, and I learned a lot during the time there. I actually made a drawing robot from scratch. I did the math and equations, design, programs and finally, I assemble all the parts, and in the end, it can draw anything that I wanted, isn't that cool?

educations.school: National Taipei University of Technology, Taiwan
educations.content: I spend lots of time here thinking about what I want to be in the future. I realized in my third year of university that I wanted to make a difference in the world and the best approach was to dig into the websites, and so I started making web based video conference system using Flash / ActionScript.
